IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: FOXCROFT SCHOOL'S MISSION IS TO PROVIDE GIRLS IN GRADES 9-12 WITH A COLLEGE PREPARATORY EDUCATION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: FOXCROFT SCHOOL'S MISSION IS TO PROVIDE GIRLS IN GRADES 9-12 WITH A COLLEGE PREPARATORY EDUCATION.
IRS990.Desc: FOXCROFT IS AN ALL-GIRLS BOARDING SCHOOL THAT PREPARES YOUNG WOMEN IN GRADES 9-12 FOR ACADEMIC SUCCESS AND LEADERSHIP IN COLLEGE AND BEYOND. VARIOUS SUMMER EDUCATION PROGRAMS ARE ALSO OPERATED UNDER THIS SAME EXEMPT PURPOSE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL EVALUATES UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAX POSITIONS BASED ON A MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT RECOGNITION STANDARD. IF THAT THRESHOLD IS MET, THE TAX POSITION IS THEN MEASURED AT THE LARGEST AMOUNT THAT IS GREATER THAN 50% LIKELY OF BEING REALIZED UPON ULTIMATE SETTLEMENT. AS OF JUNE 30, 2016, THERE ARE NO ACCRUALS FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. IF APPLICABLE, THE SCHOOL RECORDS INTEREST AND PENALTIES AS A COMPONENT OF INCOME TAX EXPENSE. TAX YEARS FROM JUNE 30, 2013 THROUGH THE CURRENT YEAR REMAIN OPEN FOR EXAMINATION BY FEDERAL AND STATE TAX AUTHORITIES.
SCHOLARSHIP AID AND TUITION WAIVERS 2,116,550. COGS -58,577.
FOXCROFT HAS WIDELY PUBLICIZED ITS RACIALLY NONDISCRIMINATORY POLICY ON ITS ADMISSIONS WEBPAGE, IN ITS STUDENT APPLICATION, IN THE COURSE LISTINGS BOOKLET, AND REGISTRATION MATERIALS.
ALL GRANT AWARDS ARE FINANCIAL AID TO FAMILIES FOR STUDENTS AT THE SCHOOL, THEREFORE THE FUNDS ARE USED IN THE UNITED STATES.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: CONSTRUCTION LABOR AND MATERIALS FOR WORK ON VARIOUS BUILDING RENOVATIONS ON CAMPUS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY AN OUTSIDE ACCOUNTANT, AND REVIEWED BY THE FULL BOARD BEFORE FILING WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD ANNUALLY SIGNS A CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE DOCUMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS DETERMINES THE COMPENSATION OF THE EXECUTIVE LEVEL MANAGEMENT BASED ON BENCHMARKS OF COMPARABLE SCHOOLS AND LOCAL ORGANIZATIONS, AND BY EVALUATING PERFORMANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FOXCROFT MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
